page.title: 04Law and Order.
page.content: The police station is on Salisbury Road. There is 1 inspector, Inspector Martin, on call all the time. There are 4 sergeants and 20 P.C.s. On 1 shift there is 1 sergeant and 3 P.C.s. They have a Transit van, 2 Metros, 1 Astra and 1 Fiesta C.I.D. car. They have a pocket radio so they can be called. The Magistrates Court sits every other Thursday and all cases are heard at this court. Most cases are dealt with by this court but more serious cases are committed to the Crown Court at Shrewsbury .
